Header: Sri Lanka ready to enter into a trade relations cooperation agreement with Thailand
Content: Minister Pavithra Wanniarachchi has said that Sri Lanka is ready to enter into a trade relations cooperation agreement with Thailand. The Minister made this reference participating in a function organized to mark the commemoration of Thailandâ€™s Republic Day. At the function held in Colombo, the Minister further pointed out that Sri Lanka highly valued the technical support given by the Thai Government.
